body_html:
I agree with @mrry, This is a great change.

Just note that there is a long-term plan to eventually merge most of the examples directory into tensorflow/models, and some of the code in this sub-directory might not survive the transition.

So while I encourage you to continue sending PRs, you might want to avoid this sub-directory.

Thanks.

body:
I agree with @mrry, This is a great change.

Just note that there is a long-term plan to eventually merge most of the examples directory into tensorflow/models, and some of the code in this sub-directory might not survive the transition. 

So while I encourage you to continue sending PRs, you might want to avoid this sub-directory.

Thanks.
